00007 class XmlSetSession extends Plugin implements IInputPlugin {
00008 
00009     public function run(Request $oRequest) {
00010         $oXml = simplexml_load_string($oRequest->getBody());
00011         if (!empty($oXml)) {
00012             $oXml->SessionId = $this->getVar('SessionId');
00013             $oRequest->setBody($oXml->asXML());
00014 
00015         } else {
00016             throw new PluginException('Unable to load XML');
00017         }
00018         return $oRequest;
00019     }
